title: Enhancing Web Development Practical Skills: Science Field Learning Through Workplace-Based and Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate expertise in scientific disciplines and workplace practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze scientific problem-solving cases linked to workplace issues using PBL methods to explain the integration of practical and academic skills
Learners can propose ways to apply teamwork, communication, and reflection skills to workplace and academic environments through workshop activities
Learners can document problem-solving processes in job contexts using digital tools and develop strategies to enhance learning agility
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
